short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search all your repositories across multiple GitHub instances

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you contribute to many projects? Does your company have a private GitHub instance? Can't remember where exactly what that repository is called, or the organization it's part of?

Search repositories across multiple GitHub instances and quickly get to the code you're looking for!

Features:
* Substring and fuzzy matching on repositories
* Quickly open the repository (or repo/issues, or repo/pulls)
* Multiplex your search public GitHub as well as GitHub Enterprise instances
